thread.title: Yahoo’s Got Spin, Not Substance
thread.title_full: Yahoo’s Got Spin, Not Substance - WSJ

author: Miriam Gottfried
title: Yahoo’s Got Spin, Not Substance
text:
Yahoo is rolling the dice with Alibaba. But even a stroke of luck there won’t clear the clouds over its core business.
In a filing Monday, Yahoo said it would pursue the spinoff of its remaining stake in Alibaba Group Holding into a separate publicly traded entity. This comes despite the Internal Revenue Service’s decision not to grant Yahoo... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
